TopicTitle: Robau's Warehouse [0.20] - MechJeb Pods & Probes and more... (7/6/13)

Articles.Content:
The original thread was lost in the April meltdown, but now with the arrival of KSP 0.20 I felt like it was time to start a new thread and post my updated and new mods.

Robau's Warehouse

MechJeb Command Pods & Probes

This adds MechJeb to all stock command pods, cockpits and probe bodies. No need to place separate MechJeb parts on your ship, just have a command pod or probe body on your vessel and MechJeb will be ready to go. Includes an optional version of the Hitchhiker pod (ÃƒÂ  la my Crew Tank Command Pod mod) to a command pod with MechJeb installed. If you use it, the Crew Tank Command Pod is no longer necessary.

Compatible with 0.20, requires MechJeb 2.0.8 or above (only the MechJeb2.dll is required).

[B]Changelog:[/B]
[u]1.4[/u]
-Removed the MechJebified External Command Seat as that didnÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t really work
-Added back in the crew cabinÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s modified internal, which was left out of the previous release by accident
-Fixed a problem with the crew cabin being unmanned
-Gave the Remote Guidance Units more rot and linPower, making them actually different from normal probes
-Lowered the crew cabinÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s rot and linPower for balancing reasons
[U]1.3[/U]
-Updated to MechJeb 2.0
-Updated to KSP 0.20
-Removed the MechJebified Advanced SAS parts as their role has been filled by the Remote Guidance Units, which have been MechJebified
-External Command Seat MechJebified
-Cupola Module MechJebified
[U]1.2[/U]
-Changed the crew cabinÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s internal space to a modified GenericSpace3. All 4 crew now appear as video feeds, but the first and fourth are in the same seat. The stock internals wonÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t allow anything better.
[U]1.1[/U]
-Probe OKTO2 MechJebified
-Added pods/rcs parameters to the crew cabin so that it maneuvers more like the other pods
-Changed the small and large ASAS into unmanned command pods, as MechJeb makes ASAS units useless. Now they can be used a way to deliver unmanned spacecraft into orbit without losing the maneuvering power of a manned craft

Crew Cabin Command Pod

The PPD-10 Hitchhiker Storage Container aka the Crew Cabin is now a working command pod instead of a standard part. Handy for testing out testing out landers or sending up space station modules.

Compatible with 0.20.

[B]Changelog:[/B]
[U]1.3[/U]
-Updated to 0.20 system
-Rot and linPower lowered for balancing reasons
[U]1.2[/U]
-Changed the crew cabinÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s internal space to a modified GenericSpace3. All 4 crew now appear as video feeds, but the first and fourth are in the same seat. The stock internals wonÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t allow anything better.
[U]1.1[/U]
-Added pods/rcs parameters to the crew cabin so that it maneuvers more like the other pods

Edited June 7, 2013 by CaptRobau
Thanks for the update! It's nice having MJ already present in the pods, as I'm constantly forgetting to add it.
Dude! Spank ewe for his one.
What ? Spank?
Did you look into the override function so that we don't have to modify the squad files? I thought that was supposed to be a thing in .20
The documentation is still a bit spread out. Hadn't heard about that before. I'll have a look and see what I can do.

Did you look into the override function so that we don't have to modify the squad files? I thought that was supposed to be a thing in .20

Too late, I totally overwrote .. overwroted .. overwritted, whatever
I installed the mechjeb 2dll in the plugins folder then I installed this by putting the parts folder in the parts folder, and mechjeb isn't showing up, is there something im doing wrong?
There's a little mistake in the part.cfg of the Hitchhiker pod. The CrewCapacity declaration has to be placed above the cost declaration. Otherweise I get a 0/0 crew capacity in the game.
Any chance of updated/Improved truss-girder pack? Love your work!

Any chance of updated/Improved truss-girder pack? Love your work!

Indeed, I second this. Please update to 0.20+ (or maybe even expand), it's very useful.

Both the MechJeb pod mod and the Crew Cabin mod have been updated. Download in the OP.

I need some new trusses! The stock ones are so lacking in variety Lol

Much needed mod but...

Please redo using modulemanager.dll to modify the part.cfg files for stock parts. This way we don't have to manually edit the part.cfg files to use your mod simultaneously with other mods on stock parts. I use it with RemoteTech Probe Compatibility (adds RT to all probes) and Chatterer (adds chatter to stock probes and modules) and they work very nicely together. Check within those files to see what they've done. It's really quite simple. Here's a link to Module Manager: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/31342-0-20-ModuleManager-1-3-for-all-your-stock-modding-needs
update to 0.21?
never mind did it myself
Does it work for 0.21?

No haven't updated it yet. Very busy with real-life. There are a few mods that do the same thing though. Typing in Robau in the Kerbal Spaceport gets you one of them, as my name is somewhere in the description.

@CaptRobau: I updated the Improved Trusses mod to 0.21.1 and ModuleManager.

You might find it useful when it comes time to update it for yourself - someone did it for my own mod and I sure did

Download
Any chance you can update this to work with career mode .22?

Nah, I'm no longer supporting this mod. I don't have the time and there's a lot of other mods who do what my stuff does, but better (ModuleManager integrated, etc.). Just search for Mechjeb on Spaceport and you'll find a whole bunch.
So KSP 0.25 just came out. Will this be compatible with that version?

Hello. Right above your post is this:

Nah, I'm no longer supporting this mod. I don't have the time and there's a lot of other mods who do what my stuff does, but better (ModuleManager integrated, etc.). Just search for Mechjeb on Spaceport and you'll find a whole bunch.

That being said, I don't know if this works in 0.25, but I do recommend following his advice and searching for other things.

Edit: Also, seeing as the last post before TOP's was more than a year ago, I recommend this thread get a lock.
Since this mod is no longer being supported I am locking this thread. If the author wishes to continue this project, then please contact the KSPF moderation team to unlock this thread.
